title: Finding out the pattern with Pascal's Triangle.
text: We know that the variables in this pattern will follow the pattern in Pascal's triangle. You should use the row of Pascal's triangle where the second number is $$4$$.

title: Finding out the coefficients.
text: The coefficients according to Pascal's triangle are $$1$$, $$4$$, $$6$$, $$4$$, $$1$$.

title: Expanding the polynomial.
text: Use the formula: $${\left(a+b\right)}^n$$ $$=$$ $$a^n$$ + $$___$$ $$a^n-1b^1$$ + $$___$$ $$a^n-2b^2$$ +... + $$___$$ $$a^1 b^n-1$$ + $$b^n$$ and fill in the blanks with the values from Pascal's triangle.

title: Plugging in the coefficients.
text: By plugging in the coefficients found earlier, we get $$x^4+4x^3 y^1+6x^2 y^2+4x^1 y^3+y^4$$.
